messages: e2b61875db20485741662517e4b9454d (13:53): i have a question: in composite nodes... should i put vector blur before or after other effects (specular blur)?

c84247cefeb3a07c65c26753231e17f7 (13:54): i would say it would rather strange not not blur the spec on a moving object

7e3e7f105a829d5b09828b6afbe24a1b (14:11): in yafray , do photons fall on transparent objects ?
5b8a284fa662b200c0d6b94314f7fc48 (14:12): Qantourisc, what kind of transparent object
5b8a284fa662b200c0d6b94314f7fc48 (14:12): You need to set the "Cdepth" to something higher than three for that to work
5b8a284fa662b200c0d6b94314f7fc48 (14:18): Still the Cdepth does need to be greater than three
